title: Launch Premium Gaming Community
tagline: Your chat is already your community - monetize the super fans

metrics.contentPerformance: 12.4% engagement rate - highest in gaming micro-creator category
metrics.audienceSignals: Average 340 concurrent viewers in chat, 78 regulars comment on every stream
metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Gaming creators with 32K followers charge $5-15/month for Discord, average 150-300 members

whyThisWorks: You have 78 regulars who are part of every stream - they'll pay for more access
12.4% engagement means real community, not just passive viewers
Gaming communities have highest retention rates (80%+ monthly)
Your audience is used to subscriptions (Twitch, YouTube, Discord Nitro)
Low effort to maintain - community will self-entertain

steps.task: Design Discord server structure (channels, roles, perks)
steps.details: Channels: General, game-specific, LFG, memes, off-topic, VIP lounge. Roles per tier with clear perks.
steps.proTip: Give each tier a cool custom name tied to your brand/game

steps.task: Create custom emotes and server branding
steps.details: Commission artist on Fiverr for 10-15 custom emotes tied to your streams and inside jokes.
steps.proTip: Include your most-spammed chat memes as emotes - instant connection

steps.task: Announce launch on stream with hype week
steps.details: One week of teasing. Show off emotes. Explain tiers. Limited founding member deal.
steps.proTip: Have your mods already subscribed and active - shows social proof

steps.task: DM your top 50 most active chatters with personal invite
steps.details: Thank them for being community pillars. These are your champions.
steps.proTip: Offer 2-3 of your biggest supporters free lifetime membership as mods

successMetrics: Target: 100 paying members by month 3 (avg $7/member = $700 MRR)

successStories.creator: @GamingWithAlex
successStories.quote: Discord became my main income - more stable than ad revenue

title: Coaching & VOD Reviews
tagline: Review gameplay VODs and offer improvement tips at $30-60/session

metrics.audienceSignals: Constant requests for gameplay advice and improvement tips
metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Gaming coaches at your level charge $30-75 per session

whyThisWorks: Gamers actively want to improve and will pay for it
You're already good enough to teach
Can do async (review VODs) or live sessions
Scales well - can do 3-5 reviews per day

steps.task: Define coaching packages (VOD Review $40, Live Session $70)
steps.details: VOD: Recorded analysis video sent within 48hrs. Live: 60-min screen share session.
steps.proTip: Offer package deals - 5 sessions for price of 4

steps.task: Create booking system and payment processing
steps.details: Use Calendly + Stripe. Collect payment upfront to avoid no-shows.

successStories.creator: @ProGameCoach
successStories.quote: Booked solid every week, most profitable thing I do

title: Subscriber Emotes & Badges
tagline: Create and sell Twitch sub emotes, badges, and animated emotes

metrics.contentPerformance: Strong brand recognition in your community
metrics.audienceSignals: Viewers want to rep your brand
metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Emote packs sell for $15-40, creators make $600-3K/mo

whyThisWorks: Can sell directly or use for Twitch subscriptions

steps.task: Commission or create 15-20 emotes and badges
steps.details: Mix of your catchphrases, reactions, and inside jokes.
steps.proTip: Poll your community on what emotes they want

title: Gaming Course/Rank-Up Guide
tagline: Comprehensive guide to ranking up or mastering specific game

metrics.audienceSignals: Viewers constantly asking 'how did you get so good?'
metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Gaming courses sell for $49-197, top courses make $5-15K/mo

whyThisWorks: Gamers invest in improving their skills

steps.details: Basics to advanced. Game mechanics, strategies, mindset, practice routines.
steps.proTip: Include VOD reviews of pro players as examples

title: Gaming Sponsorships & Brand Deals
tagline: Gaming peripherals, energy drinks, game publishers

metrics.audienceSignals: Viewers ask about your setup and gear
metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Gaming creators at 32K: $300-1,500 per sponsored stream

whyThisWorks: Gaming brands have huge influencer budgets
Can negotiate per-stream or monthly deals
Product placement is natural in gaming

steps.details: Stats, demographics, stream schedule, past sponsorships.
steps.proTip: Include average concurrent viewers and engagement rate

title: Merchandise Line
tagline: T-shirts, hoodies, mousepads with your brand/catchphrases

metrics.audienceSignals: Fans ask if you have merch

whyThisWorks: Fans love repping their favorite creators

steps.details: Hire designer or DIY. Start with t-shirt, hoodie, mousepad.
steps.proTip: Use your most popular catchphrases and inside jokes

successStories.creator: @MerchMaster
successStories.quote: Merch drops sell out in hours

title: Affiliate Links
tagline: Gaming gear, PC parts, peripherals you actually use

metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Gaming affiliates earn 3-8% commission on hardware

whyThisWorks: Gaming gear has good commission rates

steps.task: Join Amazon Associates and gaming brand programs
steps.details: Apply to affiliate programs for all products you use and recommend.

title: YouTube Membership Tiers
tagline: Similar to Twitch subs but on YouTube platform
whyThisWorks: YouTube takes smaller cut than Twitch
Dual platform income (if you stream on both)
Easier for mobile viewers to subscribe

steps.task: Enable YouTube memberships and set tiers
steps.details: Define perks for each tier. Create custom badges and emojis.

successStories.creator: @YouTubeGaming
successStories.quote: YouTube memberships more stable than Twitch

title: Community Tournament Hosting
tagline: Host community tournaments with entry fees or sponsor support

metrics.competitiveBenchmark: Tournaments with entry fees can generate $1-8K per event

steps.details: Bracket system, entry fees, prize pool, sponsorships.
steps.proTip: Get sponsor to cover prize pool so entry fees are pure profit

successStories.creator: @TournamentHost
successStories.quote: Quarterly tournaments are huge revenue spikes

title: Clip & Highlight Packages
tagline: Sell curated highlight packs for editors or fan compilations

metrics.audienceSignals: Editors and fans want your clips

whyThisWorks: Editors and content creators will buy

steps.task: Curate best clips into themed packages
steps.details: Create packages: Best Plays, Funny Moments, Tournament Highlights.
steps.proTip: Include raw files for editors to use

successStories.creator: @ClipKing
successStories.quote: Nice passive income from old content
